message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. However, I am still unable to meet you at $165. I would like to propose $155 as my maximum offer.
